[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@here/harp-mapview](./harp-mapview.md) &gt; [MapViewImageCache](./harp-mapview.mapviewimagecache.md) &gt; [addImage](./harp-mapview.mapviewimagecache.addimage.md)

## MapViewImageCache.addImage() method

Add an image and optionally start loading it. Once done, the \[\[ImageData\]\] or \[\[ImageBitmap\]\] will be stored in the \[\[ImageItem\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addImage(name: string, url: string, startLoading?: boolean): ImageItem | Promise<ImageItem | undefined>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | Name of image from \[\[Theme\]\]. |
|  url | string | URL of image. |
|  startLoading | boolean | Optional. Pass <code>true</code> to start loading the image in the background. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[ImageItem](./harp-mapview.imageitem.md) \| Promise&lt;[ImageItem](./harp-mapview.imageitem.md) \| undefined&gt;
